basics.name: Nguyen Huu Duc
basics.label: Front-end developer
basics.summary: Senior front-end developer with more than 2 years experiences building a large single page application Network Management System for Alcatel-Lucent by using AngularJS. Always looking for the solution to be more productive. Self-study to gain a deep understanding of Javascript and catch-up cutting edge front-end technology.

work.summary: Together with team build high quality large scale single page application for Network Management system for Alcatel-Lucent Inc.
highlights: Co-operate with team mate to provide high quality features.
Build directives to help colleagues remove boilerplate and be more productive.
Build a wrapper service of oboe.js to handle stream JSON response to provide better user experience and fail-safe.
Apply WebSocket to provide real time topology application.
Member of Solution Team, reviews and provide feedback for colleague's mockup, support teammate resolve troubles and train newcomers.

work.summary: Gather requirement, specification and design a web-based management system for Vietnam Posts and Telecommunications Group.
